Row.Text: I am your economic advisor. In this lesson I'll teach you how to use Workers to enhance your cities. Under your command your Workers will build city connections to collect [ICON_GOLD]gold, construct improvements to help your cities grow faster and build things quicker, and improve resources to make our people happier.
We have cities on the coast that can be connected using Harbors. Build harbors in those cities to provide city connections across the water and collect more [ICON_GOLD]gold!
